name: dogstatsd-2-statsd
description: Listen on UDP 8125 for DogStatsD-formatted metrics. Translate those to StatsD format. Send to 8135.

scripts.prettier: npm run prettier-rc && npm run prettier-cjs && npm run prettier-index && npm run prettier-package
scripts.eslint: npm run eslint-cjs && npm run eslint-index
scripts.format-lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.test: echo "Functional tests will be performed on GitHub via this project's workflows!"
scripts.dist:
npm install && npm run format-lint && echo "
Ready for submission!"
